dialogueList.name: CrabDaddy
sentences: You are a field in my class; you will always be protected.
My heart is an array with the size of 1. I only have room in it for you............
You can debug your code's error multiple times, but you only can debug your girlfriend's problem one time.

dialogueList.name: CrabDaddy
sentences: Just like how Update() called in every frame, you are called in my mind every frame too.
I love user interfaces because that is where U and I are always together.
You are my while loop condition. I keep coming back to you.
